at.irian.ankor.fx.binding.fxref

Class FxRefs

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.irian.ankor.fx.binding.fxref.FxRefs

  • public final class FxRefs
extends Object
    Convenient methods for obtaining an JavaFX Observable or Property directly from an Ankor Ref.

      • bindToggleGroup

        public static void bindToggleGroup(javafx.scene.control.ToggleGroup toggleGroup,
                   Ref ref)
        Create a bidirectional binding between a Ref and a FX ToggleGroup. The user data of every Toggle in this group must have a valid value compatible to the Ref's java type.
        Parameters:
        toggleGroup - toggle group to bind
        ref - Ref to bind
